Government Tender Announcement: Call-for-Proposal for Instrument Scientists
==============================================================

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites Canadian businesses to submit their proposals for a Supply Arrangement to provide dedicated Instrument Scientists on behalf of the Space Exploration Branch of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA).

### Tender Details

* **Title**: 31034-223036 - Instrument Scientists Supply Arrangement
* **Reference Number**: WS3750165675-Doc3826841186
* **Tender Status**: Open
* **Closing Date**: 25 July 2025, 14:00

### Objective

The NRC seeks experienced Instrument Scientists to support the development of systems for the James Webb Space Telescope at the Space Telescope Science Institute (STScI) in Baltimore, Maryland. This cooperation is part of a collaboration with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) of the United States.

### Service Description

The selected Instrument Scientists will provide Missions & Operations Support for the JWST program. The key deliverables include:

* Contributing to the development of the telescope's systems, including the precision guide sensor and the near-infrared and medium-banded short-wavelength infrared cameras (NIRISS)
* Providing technical support for the JWST program

### Supply Arrangement Overview

The Supply Arrangement includes predetermined terms and conditions that apply to all subsequent contracts. The Canada reserves the right to evaluate the Supply Arrangements in cycles, no less than bi-annually. The schedule outlining the closing dates for each bi-annual evaluation is as follows:

* 24 February 2023
* 24 July 2023
* 24 February 2024
* 24 July 2024
* 24 February 2025
* 24 July 2025
